title: HoP 296 - Morning Star of the Reformation - John Wyclif
itunes:title: HoP 296 - Morning Star of the Reformation - John Wyclif
description: John Wyclif refutes nominalism and inspires the Lollard movement, which anticipated Reformation thought with its critique of the church.
